ML Kitchens for SketchUp

Speed up your kitchen cabinet design process with smart SketchUp tools

Try it now Watch Demo

Transform Your Kitchen Design Workflow

ML Kitchens is a powerful SketchUp extension that streamlines the kitchen design process. With our intelligent tools and pre-configured cabinet library, you can create professional kitchen designs in a fraction of the time.

System Units Integration

Seamlessly work with different measurement systems and automatically convert between them.

Smart Cabinet Library

Access hundreds of pre-configured cabinet designs that you can customize to your needs.

Real-time Editing

See your changes instantly with our real-time editing and preview system.

System Requirements

  • SketchUp 2021 or newer
  • Windows 10/11 or macOS 10.15+
  • 4GB RAM minimum (8GB recommended)

Version History

Version 2.1.0 (Latest)

April 10, 2025

  • Added new cabinet styles and configurations
  • Improved material management system
  • Enhanced performance for large projects

Version 2.0.0

March 15, 2025

  • Major UI overhaul for better usability
  • New measurement and specification tools
  • Added export options for manufacturing
